massagist.name: Swedish
massagist.information: A gentle technique, with long strokes,kneading, and circular movements to relax and energize.

massagist.name: Deep tissue
massagist.information: Utilizes slow, more forceful strokes to target deep muscle layers and connective tissue.

massagist.name: Sports
massagist.information: Targets muscle-tendon junctions to boost flexibility and endurance, while reducing muscle fatigue.

massagist.name: Pre-natal
massagist.information: Lessens pregnancy discomfort, helping alleviate backaches, stiffness, leg cramps,headaches, and swelling.

massagist.name: Couples Massage
massagist.information: All mcxJalities can be performed as couples massage. Order one therapist for back to back or two for simultaneous massage.

massagist.name: Thai Massage
massagist.information: It is an ancient healing system that combines broad and targeted acupressure, stimulation and manipulation of energy lines called sen,and assisted yoga postures.

massagist.name: Relaxing
massagist.information: Helps de-stress and loosen up your body and is great for those who have had a hard working week or feel like treating themselves to some TLC!

massagist.name: At work
massagist.information: Decrease stress, improve productivity,and build employee morale with in-office chair massage.
